thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 16 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: India's WPI inflation edges down to 2.47 pct y/y in March - govt

author: Reuters Editorial
title: India's WPI inflation edges down to 2.47 pct y/y in March - govt
text:
NEW DELHI, April 16 (Reuters) - Indiaâ€™s annual wholesale price inflation slightly eased in March, helped by a fall in food prices, government data showed on Monday.
Annual wholesale price inflation last month eased to 2.47 percent from a year earlier, a shade lower than a provisional 2.48 percent rise in February, and below a 2.58 percent increase forecast by economists in a Reuters poll.
Wholesale food prices in March fell 0.07 percent year-on-year, compared with a 0.07 percent rise a month earlier, data showed. (Reporting by Manoj Kumar; Editing by Malini Menon)
